amendment.description: Amendments limit to 30 percent of income the maximum rent that an elderly or disabled family is required to pay for public housing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 11 in the Congressional Record of May 8, 1996, to limit to 30% of income the maximum rent that any elderly or disabled family could be required to pay for public housing.

action.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendments (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
